title: The blessing of Iapheth prouing the gathering in of the Gentiles, and finall conuersion of the Iewes. Expressed in diuers profitable sermons. By Thomas Cooper.
author: Cooper, Thomas, 1517?-1594.
publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for Richard Redmer, and are to be solde at the West ende of Pauls,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
